overview: Shyla Foxxx plays the domineering wife who succeeds in driving her husband, John Decker, to a pitiful life as a bum on the skids. Shyla takes great pleasure from humiliating John, a behavior which has been brought on by her terrible experiences as a child. John tries to understand, and through some sexual healing of his own, will work on fix his relationship.
title: Taboo 16: But Not Sweet
